verses.roman:
gudaṁ puṁso vinirbhinnaṁ
mitro lokeśa āviśat
pāyunāṁśena yenāsau
visargaṁ pratipadyate

synonyms: gudam—evacuating outlet; puṁsaḥ—of the gigantic form; vinirbhinnam—being separately manifested; mitraḥ—the sun-god; loka-īśaḥ—the director named Mitra; āviśat—entered; pāyunā aṁśena—with the partial evacuation process; yena—by which; asau—the living entity; visargam—evacuation; pratipadyate—performs.
translation: The evacuating channel separately became manifest, and the director named Mitra entered into it with partial organs of evacuation. Thus the living entities are able to pass stool and urine.
